translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The Dhamma-reversal, the Triad-duka Paṭṭhāna,

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽10.5. Kusalattika, Āsavagocchaka🔽Nakusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nakusalaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.🔽Nakusalaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusalattika āsavagocchaka  na kusalam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam nasa āsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa  na kusalam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: The profitable triad, the section on the effluents

original: Nakusalaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa
translated: With respect to a profitable and not an effluent state … (abbreviated). original: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nakusalaṁ noāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.🔽Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam no āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa  na kusalam na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam na anāsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca  na kusalam āsava vippayuttam nasa āsavam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
